fields.summary: Windows: Titanium.UI.WebView don't load local html page
fields.environment:
OS: Windows 8.1 Pro 
Visual Studio: 2013 Update 4 
Appcelerator Studio: 4.4.0 
Titanium SDK: 5.1.1.GA

comments.body:
Thanks you!

The workaround works well.

Luca

Verified as fixed, WebView with local html file now opens correctly without issue on windows devices.

Tested on: 
Windows 10 Pro 
Windows Phone 10.0 & 8.1 (Microsoft Lumia 640 LTE) 
Appc Studio: 4.6.0.201604081249 
Ti SDK: 5.3.0.v20160413061223 
Appc NPM: 4.2.5-1 
Appc Core: 5.3.0-12 
Node: v4.4.2

*Closing Ticket.*
